type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance, first strike
[i]Follow-Up[/i] – Whenever Sigurd, Holy Knight is blocked by a creature with lesser toughness, he gains double strike until end of turn.
[i]Oath to Aid[/i] – {1}{R}{W}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
Partner with Deirdre, Lady of the Forest
